formName: First draft of Journey selector tool for AEO

sections.title: Which AEO status is your business applying for?

fields.label: Which AEO status is your business applying for?
optionHelpText: Your business must be able to show it has staff with the experience or qualifications to deal with customs activities
Your business must  be able to show it has security standards in place for its customs activities
Your business must also be able to show it has both experienced or qualified staff, and security standards in place for its customs activities

fields.infoText:
You need to complete all forms on this page.  



1. You can start and save any form in any order.
2. Authorised people can work on different forms at the same time, using the same Government Gateway ID and password. 
3. When you are ready, you must submit all your forms within a **24 hour** period.

We save your progress for **28 days** from when you select the first link.

[C117](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Business and customs addresses, activity and audited accounts, responsible people details

Upload audited accounts for last 3 years of trading - PDF or jpeg (5MB maximum)
[C118-1-1](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Audits, internal structure and reorganisation, company and third party locations
[C118-1-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Volume of business, annual turnover and accounts, declarations estimates, duty and VAT
[C118-1-3](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Customs formalities, tariff classifications, value and certification, plus anti-dumping or countervailing duties
[C118-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Compliance record, convictions and customs authorisation

[C118-3-1](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Audit trail, internal control system, flow of goods, stocktaking checks, recent customs routes audit report

Upload a recent customs routes audit report - PDF or jpeg (5MB maximum)
[C118-3-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) -  Customs routines, computer system back-up and protection, security documentation and compliance

[C118-4](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Financial solvency and standing, Duty Deferment accounts, approved cash flow, balance sheet and profit/loss forecasts

If established in last 3 years, provide latest cash flow, balance sheet and profit and loss forecasts approved by directors, partners, sole proprietor - upload in PDF or jpeg (5MB maximum)
[C118-5](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Customs competence expert, their professional qualifications, training and European Standardisation compliance

sections.title: Apply for AEO security and safety

fields.infoText:
You need to complete all of the forms on this page.  
  
We save your progress for **28 days**, starting from when you select the first link.  
  
When you are ready, you must submit all your forms within a **24 hour** period.

fields.label: infoAdvice
fields.infoText:
To help complete everything in time:  
- you can start and save any form in any order
- authorised people in your business can work on different forms at the same time, using the same Government Gateway ID and password
##Forms you need to complete
[C117](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Business and customs addresses, activity and audited accounts, responsible people details

fields.label: Read about what you'll need to complete C117
fields.infoText:
**Detail about the business**, including:
- All business addresses, including where you keep customs identification and documentation
- Legal registration number
- VAT registered number

**Detail about the people**, including:
- Name, address and email of person responsible for customs matters
- Name, position, telephone number and email of designated contact person
- Name, address, position, date of birth and National Insurance number for person in charge of company or control of management contact

You will need National Insurance numbers for UK nationals, and residential addresses for non-UK nationals.

**Detail about the business activity**, including:
- EU member states, ports and customs offices you use to import, export, or transit goods
- Simplifications or facilitations your business has, with the type, code, authorisation numbers, plus any certificates
- Upload audited accounts for last 3 years of trading - pdf or jpeg (5mb maximum)
[C118-1-1](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Audits, internal structure and reorganisation, company and third party locations

fields.label: Read about what you'll need to complete C118-1-1
fields.infoText:
**Business information details**, including:


- Any AEO authorisation or current audits of other companies in your group

- If your company was established in the last 3 years from internal reorganisation


- Who is responsible for customs matters, their name and National Insurance number, orate of birth if non-UK national


- Company locations, including employee numbers and business activity


- Any third party locations where outsourced work takes place


- Internal organisation structure and responsibilities of each department
[C118-1-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Volume of business, annual turnover and accounts, declarations estimates, duty and VAT

fields.label: Read about what you'll need to complete C118-1-2
fields.infoText:
**Volume of business details**, including:

* Annual turnover figures for the last 3 sets of completed annual accounts
* Annual net profit or loss figure for the last 3 sets of completed annual accounts
* Any storage facilities you use which are owned by others
* Estimates for each of the last 3 years of:
   * number and value of import declarations  
    * number and value of import/re-export declarations  
     * number and value of the special procedures declarations  
     * customs duty paid  
     * excise amount paid  
    * import VAT paid




* Any changes you foresee in the next 2 years to:
   * structure
    * supply chain
[C118-1-3](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Customs formalities, tariff classifications, value and certification, plus anti-dumping or countervailing duties

fields.label: Read about what you'll need to complete C118-1-3
fields.infoText:
Business customs matters details, including





*Who performs customs formalities, including EORI


*If you represent anyone else for customs formalities


*How you decide tariff classification of goods, and make sure these are correct


*How you decide customs value, and make sure these are correct


*Any overview of preferential or non-preferential origin of imported goods


*How you verify the country of origin for goods


*How you issue proof of preferences and certificates for origin for exportation


*Any goods subject to anti-dumping or countervailing duties, plus details of manufacturers or countries outside EU whose goods are subject to these duties
[C118-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Compliance record, convictions and customs authorisation

[C118-3-1](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Audit trail, internal control system, flow of goods, stocktaking checks, recent customs routes audit report

Upload a recent customs routes audit report - PDF or jpeg (5MB maximum)
[C118-3-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) -  Customs routines, computer system back-up and protection, security documentation and compliance

[C118-4](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Financial solvency and standing, Duty Deferment accounts, approved cash flow, balance sheet and profit/loss forecasts

If established in last 3 years, provide latest cash flow, balance sheet and profit and loss forecasts approved by directors, partners, sole proprietor - upload in PDF or jpeg (5MB maximum)
[C118-6-1](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Site and goods security, safety requirements, risk and threat assessments, external security providers
[C118-6-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Building and boundary security, access to premises and parking
[C118-6-3](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Cargo storage, goods sealing and marking, security checks, loading and transportation
[C118-6-4](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Employee security and training, partners and external services

sections.title: Apply for both AEO customs simplification and AEO security and safety

fields.infoText:
You need to complete all of the forms on this page.  

We save your data for **28 days** while you fill out the forms in this list. This starts from when you select the first link. When you have finished filling out every form, you must submit everything within a **24 hour** period. If you do not submit within this period, we will reject your application. 

Because of this, you should gather all the information you need before you start.

fields.label: Tips to complete your application
fields.infoText:
To help you submit and get your information right first time:
- you can start and save any form in any order
- authorised people in your business can work on different forms at the same time, using the same Government Gateway ID and password. 
- do not to submit your first form until you are ready to submit everything

[C117](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - 

**About the business**, including:


- All business addresses, including where you keep customs identification and documentation


- Legal registration number


- VAT registered number





**About the people**, including:


- Name, address and email of person responsible for customs matters


- Name, position, telephone number and email of designated contact person


- Name, address, position, date of birth and National Insurance number for person in charge of company or control of management contact





- You will need National Insurance numbers for UK nationals, and residential addresses for non-UK nationals.





**About the business activity**, including:


- EU member states, ports and customs offices you use to import, export, or transit goods


- Simplifications or facilitations your business has, with the type, code, authorisation numbers, plus any certificates


- Upload audited accounts for last 3 years of trading - PDF or jpeg (5MB maximum)

[C118-1-1](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - 


**Business information details**, including





- Any AEO authorisation or current audits of other companies in your group

- If your company was established in the last 3 years from internal reorganisation

- Who is responsible for customs matters, their name and National Insurance number, orate of birth if non-UK national

- Company locations, including employee numbers and business activity

- Any third party locations where outsourced work takes place

- Internal organisation structure and responsibilities of each department
[C118-1-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Volume of business, annual turnover and accounts, declarations estimates, duty and VAT
[C118-1-3](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Customs formalities, tariff classifications, value and certification, plus anti-dumping or countervailing duties
[C118-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Compliance record, convictions and customs authorisation

[C118-3-1](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Audit trail, internal control system, flow of goods, stocktaking checks, recent customs routes audit report

Upload a recent customs routes audit report - PDF or jpeg (5MB maximum)
[C118-3-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) -  Customs routines, computer system back-up and protection, security documentation and compliance

[C118-4](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Financial solvency and standing, Duty Deferment accounts, approved cash flow, balance sheet and profit/loss forecasts

If established in last 3 years, provide latest cash flow, balance sheet and profit and loss forecasts approved by directors, partners, sole proprietor - upload in PDF or jpeg (5MB maximum)
[C118-5](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Customs competence expert, their professional qualifications, training and European Standardisation compliance
[C118-6-1](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Site and goods security, safety requirements, risk and threat assessments, external security providers
[C118-6-2](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Building and boundary security, access to premises and parking
[C118-6-3](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology) - Cargo storage, goods sealing and marking, security checks, loading and transportation

fields.label: Provide details below of who is signing the declaration
First name
fields.errorMessage: First name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Last name
fields.errorMessage: Last name can only include letters a to z, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: Status
fields.helpText: For example, director, financial controller or secretary
fields.errorMessage: Position in the company can only include letters, numbers, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes

fields.label: To receive confirmation that your return has been submitted, enter an email address below
Email address
fields.errorMessage: Enter a valid email address with no spaces, like name@example.com

fields.infoText: This is your last opportunity to print or save a pdf copy of your submitted form.
